<!--Kabads - musings, mutterings and murmerings-->

I work in education, but have had a background in computer since 1980s, using my Computing Skills in pretty much every job I have held.

I'm currently working on sysadmin jobs for particular clients, maintaining their servers and setting up software on internet enabled servers.

I've been a keen runner for the last 3 years and enjoy getting in some miles at the weekend.

I also like to read - especially science fiction.

If you wish to contact me, send me a DM through twitter.

Currently reading: Bernard Cornwell - The Last Kingdom.
